page.title: 05Games
page.content: We play{Hide and Seek}like this. Somebody counts up to 50 and the others hide.When the counter has counted up to 50 she says "Coming ready or not".Then she goes looking for the others.If she sees any of them she says 1,2,3 and the persons name she has seen.If she hasn't seen a person then the person can go to the post and say "Freedom all" and then another person is on. This is how we play{Rounders. We have 4 bases,a ball and a bat.The bowler throws the ball to you,you hit the ball then you drop the bat and run around the 4 bases.If you managed to get a rounder you have to touch 4th base with your foot.If you are half way between any of the bases and a person stumps the base you are running to you will be out.You can be caught out.
